title: parAmukham tagumO
sahitya:
parAmukham tagumO undan padam sharaNaDainda EzhaipAl


anupallavi

  varAbhayam tarum karAra vindam iraNDu menaik-kaNDanji oLindadEn


caraNam    surA surarum viri tarA talam sakala carAcaram paNi mayilApuriyil vaLar
parAtparA kalpakAmbikA ramaNa harOm harOm enrirAp-paghal bhajittum
